page.title: 18SCHOOL PICNIC
page.content: One day in June we went to{Banff Links which is about 14 miles from here. when we got there we all asked if we could go into the sea and have a swim which we were allowed to do. We did not stay in long as it was very cold and the tide was going out. After we dressed we went on the swings and roundabout. At 12:00 we ate apples, sausage rolls, currant buns and drank juice. After that a man came and asked if we wanted to be taken by a TV crew for a news programme about a Miniature railway that had just been built. We all ran over and got on the train. The train went to the town of Banff and back again. When we got off we got our things and went home on the bus.
